name: 托马斯·杰斐逊
bio: 美国第三任总统，独立宣言的主要起草人。博学多才，精通建筑、科学、哲学。主张小政府、农业共和国理念。任内完成路易斯安那购地，使国土面积翻倍。
bio_en: Third President of the United States and principal author of the Declaration of Independence. A polymath—architect, scientist, diplomat, and philosopher—he championed individual liberty and limited government. The Louisiana Purchase doubled the nation's territory. A slaveholder who wrote 'all men are created equal,' he remains one of America's most complex and consequential figures.

personalEvents.title: 起草独立宣言
personalEvents.description: 受大陆会议委托，执笔起草《独立宣言》
personalEvents.description_en: Commissioned by the Continental Congress to draft the Declaration of Independence

personalEvents.title: 就任第三任总统
personalEvents.description: 击败亚当斯当选总统，实现首次政党轮替
personalEvents.description_en: Defeated Adams to become President, achieving the first peaceful transfer of power between political parties

personalEvents.title: 路易斯安那购地
personalEvents.description: 以1500万美元从法国购买路易斯安那，国土翻倍
personalEvents.description_en: Purchased Louisiana Territory from France for $15 million, doubling the nation's size
